Class FilesQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.uploadcare.api.FilesQueryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
PaginatedQueryBuilder<File>
public class FilesQueryBuilder
extends Object
implements PaginatedQueryBuilder<File>

File resource request builder. Allows to specify some file filters and get results.

See Also:
File

Method Detail

removed

public FilesQueryBuilder removed(boolean removed)
Adds a filter for removed files.

Parameters:
removed - If true, accepts removed files, otherwise declines them.

Adds a filter for stored files.
